name: Groove Galaxy
description:
EXPLORE the Galaxy and extend your Groove across distant solar systems. COLONIZE planets by tapping along to the RHYTHM of your songs. Earn music NOTES to build state-of-the-art microphones, recording studios and metronomes, in order to increase your groove production. Unlock the mysteries of the elusive TEMPLE OF GROOVE.

DISCOVER THE PLANETS IN YOUR GALAXY
Fire, Ice, Earth, Gas, and even Gem Planets are ready for the taking, destined to receive your FUNKY GROOVE.

DEVELOP EVERY PLANET
Use NOTES to create majestic new BUILDINGS, expand your dance-loving population, and EARN MAJOR PROFIT!

PLAY YOUR OWN SONGS
Pick any song from YOUR LIBRARY… and tap along to the beat!

COMPETE AGAINST OTHER PLAYERS
You think your sense of rhythm has no match? Put it to the test in ASTEROID EVENTS, where your skills will be tested…and REWARDS will be yours for the taking!

ITUNES MUSIC COMPATIBLE
Preview and purchase iTunes Music in the game!

KEYS & CHORDS
We use Jamn Player's chord recognition technology to detect Chords and Keys of your songs.

AMAZING GRAPHICS
Feast your eyes on our fabulous, groovy art style!

UNLOCK FUNKY CHARACTERS
See how colonizing your planets increases its DANCING population. Make them groove to the music and bounce to the rhythm!

SUPPORTS CLOUD SAVING AND DATA BACKUP
Save any time, play on any device, and back up your game progress!


What are you waiting for, explorer? The Galaxy is waiting for you and your bombastic groove!
